properties.name: An accurate map of South America : drawn from the best modern maps and charts, and regulated by astron'l. observatns. / by Eman. Bowen, geog'r. to His Majesty, 1747.
properties.description: from An account of the European settlements in America : in six parts ... Each part contains an accurate description of the settlements in it, their extent, climate, productions, trade, genius and disposition of their inhabitants ; the interests of the several powers of Europe with respect to those settlements, and their political and commercial views with regard to each other.
